      • getGuidEntry

        public static GuidEntry getGuidEntry(String gnsName,
                                     String username)
        Retrieves the public/private key pair for the given user.
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the name of the GNS instance (e.g. "server.gns.name:8080")
        username - the user name
        Returns:
        the GUID entry if found, null otherwise

      • removeKeyPair

        public static void removeKeyPair(String gnsName,
                                 String username)
        Remove the public/private key pair from preferences for the given user.
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the name of the GNS instance (e.g. "server.gns.name:8080")
        username - the user name

      • saveKeyPair

        public static void saveKeyPair(String gnsName,
                               String username,
                               String guid,
                               KeyPair keyPair)
        Saves the public/private key pair to preferences for the given user.
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the name of the GNS instance (e.g. "server.gns.name:8080")
        username - the user name or human readable name
        guid - the GUID value
        keyPair - public and private keys for that GUID

      • setDefaultGuidEntry

        public static void setDefaultGuidEntry(String gnsName,
                                       String username)
        Set the default GUID to use in the user preferences (usually the account GUID)
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the name of the GNS instance (e.g. "server.gns.name:8080")
        username - the alias of the default GUID to use

      • removeDefaultGuidEntry

        public static void removeDefaultGuidEntry(String gnsName)
        Set the default GUID to use in the user preferences (usually the account GUID)
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the name of the GNS instance (e.g. "server.gns.name:8080")

      • getDefaultGuidEntry

        public static GuidEntry getDefaultGuidEntry(String gnsName)
        Return the GUID entry for the default GUID set in the user preferences (if any)
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the name of the GNS instance (e.g. "server.gns.name:8080")
        Returns:
        the default GUID entry or null if not set or invalid

      • setDefaultGns

        @Deprecated
public static void setDefaultGns(String gnsHostPort)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the default GNS to use in the user preferences. Syntax to use is with a colon between the host and port so that the string can be re-used as is in the GnsConnect command.
        Parameters:
        gnsHostPort - a string of host:port:disableSSLBoolean

      • getDefaultGns

        @Deprecated
public static String getDefaultGns()
        Deprecated. 
        Return the default GNS Host:Port:disableSSLBoolean as a String if defined (null if not defined)
        Returns:
        the default GNS saved in the user prefences as a string of host:port:disableSSLBoolean

      • removeDefaultGns

        @Deprecated
public static void removeDefaultGns()
        Deprecated. 
        Remove the default GNS to use in the user preferences.

      • getAllGuids

        public static List<GuidEntry> getAllGuids(String gnsName)
        Return the list of all GUIDs stored locally that belong to a particular GNS instance. This seems kind of hokey.
        Parameters:
        gnsName - the GNS host:port
        Returns:
        all matching GUIDs
